question_text: Please select your preferred language:
How old are you?
What is your gender?
What best describes where you live?
Overall, would you say the increased use of artificial intelligence (AI) in daily life makes you feelâ€¦
What religious group or faith do you most identify with?
What country or region do you most identify with?

When you work with an AI assistant, would you prefer it to: 
Be more formal or casual in its responses?
Provide detailed explanations or get straight to the point?
Take on a specific role (like a teacher, editor, or coach)?
Focus on certain topics or areas of expertise?

What kind of personality traits would be most helpful for your needs? For instance:
Should it be more analytical or creative?
Would you like it to ask clarifying questions or work with what you provide?
Should it challenge your ideas or mainly provide support?
Would you want your AI to be tailored to your local context? What would that look like?

Think about your goals:
Are you using AI mainly for learning, productivity, creativity, or something else? How well is it working?

Think about your goals:
Would you prefer responses that encourage discussion or just give direct answers?
Imagine you're working with an AI assistant on important tasks in your life. What principles or values would you want this AI to consistently demonstrate in all its interactions?
In your culture, what makes a conversation feel respectful and appropriate? Describe specific ways of speaking or interacting that show respect.
What topics or types of advice should an AI never give in your cultural context, even if asked?
When should an AI defer to human wisdom or community leaders rather than providing its own answers?
Describe how people in your community typically approach solving complex problems. What steps or considerations are most important?
What role should traditional or cultural knowledge play when an AI is helping solve problems in your community?
What aspects of your culture might be misunderstood by an AI system trained primarily on Western data? How should the AI adapt?
How should an AI assistant demonstrate that it understands and respects your cultural heritage while still being helpful with modern tasks?
If an AI assistant makes a cultural mistake, what would be the most appropriate way for it to acknowledge and correct the error?
What would make you feel confident that an AI system truly understands and respects your cultural perspective?
In your community, what makes someone a trustworthy advisor? Please describe specific behaviors or qualities that build trust
When someone disagrees with an authority figure in your community, what is the appropriate way for them to express that disagreement?
What topics or life decisions should always be discussed with family members or community elders before making a choice?
If you could have your AI  think, behave / respond  like any person in the world, who would it be and why?
Name some things that you would like AI to have in common with you, and some things that you would like AI to do differently to you?
Is there anything about your life or your cultures that you would like your AI to know about you?
Do you feel you were able to fully express your views on your culture, your values, and what you want for the future in this conversation? (through what you responded and how you voted)
Do you feel like you understand yourself better after participating in this conversation?
Lastly, is there anything you felt you could not express in this conversation that you want to make sure the people working on this know?
